This website is a part of [SKAI](https://chabefer.github.io/SKY/index.html), the Social Science Knowledge Accumulation Initiative. 
You can access the source code on [GitHub](https://github.com/chabefer/SKAI_Bias_Observational_Methods). 
You can make suggestions on [GitHub Discussion](https://github.com/chabefer/SKAI_Bias_Observational_Methods/discussions). 
You can access a tutorial on how to contribute to this website on [SKAI](https://chabefer.github.io/SKY/tutoSKY.html).
